Subject: Inaccurate/duplicate data under Device Control - Computers
Description: Hi, we are doing an audit and see that there is inaccurate data shown under Device Control - Computers for some entries. An example of this is searching for the Serial number: HWT4T39WFJ . This populates with one of the entries with username “rhyscote”, although that one should be under a different Serial number. The CSV export shows the same information as what is in the UI with this example. Can you confirm why the information is showing inaccurately?
Solution_Comment__c: We upgraded the EPP server to the latest version 5941 and then we upgraded the EPP client to the latest version(it was about 2-3 years of updates behind) and after that the Serial Number got updated and was read correctly.
